ecommerce_platform.title: E-Commerce Platform
ecommerce_platform.description: A full-stack e-commerce application with payment integration, user authentication, and admin dashboard.

social_media_dashboard.title: Social Media Dashboard
social_media_dashboard.description: A responsive dashboard that aggregates and visualizes social media metrics from multiple platforms.

task_management_app.title: Task Management App
task_management_app.description: Collaborative task management application with real-time updates and team collaboration features.

weather_application.title: Weather Application
weather_application.description: Real-time weather forecast application with location detection and interactive maps.

portfolio_website.title: Portfolio Website
portfolio_website.description: Personal portfolio website built with Gatsby and Tailwind CSS, featuring animations and responsive design.

finance_tracker.title: Finance Tracker
finance_tracker.description: Personal finance tracking application with expense categorization and visualization.
